LanguageData.ZP_RawGreenOnion.label: Negi
LanguageData.ZP_RawGreenOnion.description: This Japanese green onion resembles a leek, but is distinguishable by its longer, more slender appearance. As a crop, it has a long growing period and minor yield; yet, its high cold tolerance means it can continue to grow when most other crops can't.
LanguageData.ZP_RawCabbage.label: Cabbage
LanguageData.ZP_RawCabbage.description: Kyabetsu (cabbage) is a cold resistant plant that can be grown in paddy fields.
LanguageData.ZP_RawSpinach.label: Spinach
LanguageData.ZP_RawSpinach.description: Hōrensō (spinach) is a cold resistant plant with a low yield and high nutritional value.
LanguageData.ZP_RawOnion.label: Onion
LanguageData.ZP_RawOnion.description: Tamanegi (onion) is a highly cold resistant plant.
